title: Looking for reliable Gold+ player to help carry me out of Silver
body: Looking for a solid player who doesn't get tilted very easily and would like to help carry me out of Silver. I play a range of Supp and Top champions so I can accommodate to your champion pool. I have had a lot of experience playing in Gold with some Platinum friends but have never been able to solo carry myself out of Silver. Please help! Add me as a friend if you would like to help out a fellow summoner. | (• ◡•)| (❍ᴥ❍ʋ)

replies.body: Hi I am a returning player was diamond 1 and am thinking I am going to rank up a new account as well and was gonna look for a support to play with,  have added in game flick me a message
Sure, what level is your new account now?
It's level 28 and I have a plat smurf I can use if u reach gold 5, is your name the same in game as forums?

Ah the cancer that is silver. I usually just play hyper snowball champions (evelynn, graves etc) until I'm in gold then switch back to my main (supp).

It seems like a joke but my diamond friend who is an Udyr main struggles biiig time to get out of silver. Last account he ranked up to Plat started in Silver 1 and he was in there for nearly 60 games. Once he broke into gold I think he got Plat in around 20 games.

Silver is the worst ELO by far.

Good luck.
Thanks! Being stuck in elo hell truly sucks (ノಠ益ಠ)ノ彡┻━┻
